text: Ri Yong-rae () is a North Korean politician. He is a member of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea. ==Biography== Born in Jangryong of the People's Army of Korea, he was promoted to Lieutenant General in February 2012 after being a Major general of in April 2002. In May 2016, at the 7th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea, he was appointed to the 7th Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and the head of the Civil Defense Department of the Workers' Party of Korea. In March 2014, he was elected 13th convocation to the Supreme People's Assembly.“北, 당 중앙위원 128명, 후보위원 106명 발표”. 《노컷뉴스》. 2016년 5월 10일. 2018년 6월 11일에 확인함. ==References== Category:Members of the Supreme People's Assembly Category:Workers' Party of Korea politicians
title: Ri Yong-rae
